m_descr:
OpenRemote is a very nice generic User Interface System for Smart Homes. You find more information about this service in the README.md file included with this package. This app provides a simplified interface to ZWay using standard OpenRemote http calls. For more information how to use this module please refer to the OpenRemote site (http://www.openremote.org/x/nwFWAQ).

Settings: No further settings.
Usage: The OpenRemote UI will show the devices included.
